name: King's Lair (itch)
description:
King's Lair Version  0.1.1
A Rogue-Lite, Bullet hell game. Kill enemies, Die, Get Stronger and Kill more Enemies

please report bugs in my mail: agustindurcach@gmail.com


(10/1/23) Version 0.1.1:
-Fixed some Bugs
-Some Bosses now have an indicator for when they are going to move fast with an attack.
(9/1/23 ) Version 0.1
